About
=====

``lddecay`` computes and plots pairwise LD from sites read in a VCF file
using the EggLib package.

Documentation
=============

Documentation is available on `Read the Docs`_.

.. _`Read the Docs`: <https://lddecay.readthedocs.io/`>

Installation
============

::

    pip install lddecay
